summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 GMC SIERRA 1500. THE CONTACT STATED THAT A RECALL NOTICE WAS RECEIVED IN MID JULY OF 2016 FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V381000 (AIR BAGS). A DEALER HAD NOT BEEN CONTACTED YET BECAUSE THE NOTICE INDICATED THAT OWNERS WOULD BE NOTIFIED WHEN THE PART BECAME AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT RECEIVED A RESPONSE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
